      public String[][] readDataFromExcel(String filePath, String sheetName) throws IOException
      Return data stored in an excel sheet in the form of a 2 dimensional array.
      Parameters:
      filePath - [String] : Excel sheet File Path
      sheetName - [String] : Excel sheet name from which data is to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      [2 dimesional array of String] Data stored in the excel sheet.
      Throws:
      IOException - : If file cannot be read
